pageContext.claim: “But we worked with Congress to cut down the approval and permitting process so that it takes no longer than 2 years, instead of, on average, 10 to 12 to 17 years to build a simple road.”
pageContext.analysis: Recent government studies say the permit approval time ranges from 4.6 to 6.6 years. Our friends at PolitiFact found only one study that suggested that permitting could take 10 years.
